title: AskyBlock空岛不刷怪
author: chengzi156
txt_content: 其他地区都刷怪，但是空岛不刷怎么解

replies.author: a87339531
replies.txt_content:
我之前也这样,已经完美解决,检查空岛的config  
spawn:
  # The following are recommended to be true at spawn
  allowdooruse: true
  allowleverbuttonuse: true
  allowchestaccess: true
  allowfurnaceuse: true
  allowmusic: true
  allowcrafting: true
  allowbrewing: true
  allowgateuse: true
  allowanimalspawn: true
  allowmobkilling: true
  allowenchanting: true
  allowanviluse: true
  allowpressureplates: true
  allowvisitoritemdrop: true
  allowvisitoritempickup: true

  # The following are recommended to be false at spawn, but you can change
  allowbreakblocks: false
  allowplaceblocks: false
  allowredstone: false
  allowanimalkilling: false
  allowmobspawn: false
检查代码allomobspawn 是否开启,改为true 即可

replies.author: sgoye
replies.txt_content:
试试输入这个命令 /gamerule doMobSpawning true 
装了MV多世界插件试试这个 /mv gamerule doMobSpawning true

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
多世界插件找到askyblock
difficulty选项如果是0  转换成1或者2或者3

如果不为0
输入这个指令 /gamerule doMobSpawning true

replies.author: lzh5598
replies.txt_content: 是否是直接生成的空岛世界，没有生成主世界。也有时候是直接生成空岛世界导致的。

replies.author: 晴天娃娃_
replies.txt_content: 你看看你的ess配置文件有没有禁止刷怪，或者有没有装什么防止刷怪的插件,然后世界名写错了= =

replies.author: zangxue
replies.txt_content: 除了楼上说的 建议也输入以下/mv modify set diff hard

replies.author: chengzi156
replies.txt_content: 你们说的全部设置过了。。。难度是hard，就是不刷，主世界可以刷怪，地狱什么的都可以。。
